column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Welp I expected more from this place
column2: I don't know if it's cause we're from Cali and we have really good pizza but to be honest I've have better Round Table and Mountain Mike's than this
column3: def not worth the 1 1/2 hr wait it took. Pizza was salty and dry
column4: more sauce would have been nice. Our salad was better than the darn pizza lol. P.s not too many topping options either
